body {
  font-family: "Montserrat", sans-serif;
  color: #222;
}

.btn {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: #fff;
  background: #ef5b5b;
  padding: 20px 40px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-weight: bold;
  border-radius: 7.5px;
  line-height: 1;
  display: inline-block;
}
.btn:hover {
  cursor: pointer;
  text-decoration: none;
  background: #ea2d2d;
  color: #fff;
}
.btn-600 {
  font-weight: 600;
}
.btn-tight {
  font-size: 14px;
  text-transform: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  padding: 7.5px 25px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

.header {
  padding: 30px 0;
}
.header_row {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
}
.header .nav_link {
  color: #222;
  font-weight: 700;
  letter-spacing: -0.5px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
.header .nav_link:hover {
  color: #ef5b5b;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.header .nav_link + .nav_link {
  margin-left: 30px;
}
.header .nav_btn {
  background: #ef5b5b;
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: bold;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  padding: 12.5px 30px;
  border-radius: 7.5px;
  margin-left: 35px;
}
.header .nav_btn:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
  background: #ea2d2d;
}

.mainScreen {
  background: url(https://kurochkin.design/external/fcc-landing-page/main-bg.jpg);
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: left center;

  padding-bottom: 100px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  user-select: none;
}

  line-height: 1.1;
}

  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

  font-size: 30px;
  line-height: 1.2;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
}

  padding-top: 90px;
  padding-bottom: 150px;
}

  display: flex;
}

  width: 250px;

}

}

}

  color: #808080;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
}

  width: 100%;

  padding-left: 30px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-around;
}

.featuredTrip {

  overflow: hidden;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}

  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  height: 400px;
}

  object-fit: contain;
  transition: all 0.6s;
}

  text-align: center;
  font-weight: 700;
  line-height: 1;
  padding: 25px 0;

}

  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;

}

  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;

}

}
